SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

oracle.cloud.storage.javaservice
Interface StorageHelper

public interface StorageHelper

StorageHelper interface defines the contract between the storage service and the java service. Care should be taken when making changes to this method. There are dependencies on this interface on both OPCSTORAGE and JAVASERVICE labels

Author:
Copyright (c) 2013, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
